activity.title: ohcnetwork/care#2788
activity.text: > * [ ] Once an encounter is marked a complete, the staff user type is not able to view the encounter on revisiting the existing encounter. Both questionnaire and patient API's are throwing 403 and 404 errors > > Note: The data is visible when the same users, add him/herself to the user's tab in the patient details page > Looks like the query parameters are coming after "/"
